non_compliant.section: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
non_compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interest does not automatically permit the sale of personal data.  The GDPR requires a balance between the legitimate interests of the company and the rights and freedoms of individuals. Selling data usually requires explicit consent under GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to clarify whether personal data is being sold and, if so, provide a clear legal basis for doing so. If relying on legitimate interest, a detailed assessment should be conducted and documented to demonstrate that the interests of the company outweigh the rights of individuals.
